Multipurpose rotary tool – From woodworking, carpentry, car care to jewelry making and more; Not recommended for cutting, drilling, or routing.
The versatile 7760 Lite is the diyer’s go-to solution for light duty DIY and crafting projects. Includes 10 accessories to kick start your projects right out of the box.
Quick accessory changes – With the patented EZ Twist Nose Cap, accessory changes are easy and done without the need of a wrench. Collet size is 1.8”.
Variable speed – Seamlessly adjust to the ideal speed from 8,000 to 25,000 for optimal control & maneuverability
Easy battery charging – The rechargeable 4V Li-ion battery & convenient USB charger ensures that it’s ready whenever you are, Battery Size: 4-volt, Battery Amp Hours: 2Ah
Battery life indicator – LED light illuminates to notify you when the battery needs to be charged
Portable & lightweight – 360-degree soft grip material allows for comfort & precise control. Cordless design offers the freedom to take it anywhere

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

NETGEAR AC750 WiFi Range Extender (EX3700-100NAS). System Requirements:2.4 and/or 5GHz, 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac wireless router or gateway, Microsoft. Internet Explorer. 8.0, Firefox. 20, Safari. 5.1, Google Chrome 25.0 browsers or higher. Troubleshooting tip- If you cannot get a WiFi connection working, you can use an Ethernet cable to connect your computer to the extender. Data throughput, signal range, and wireless coverage per sq. ft. may vary due to differences in operating environments of wireless networks, including without limitation building materials and wireless interference. Operating temperature: 32°to 104°F.
EXTENDED WIRELESS COVERAGE: Adds Wi-Fi range coverage up to 1000 sq ft, and connects up to 15 devices such as laptops, smartphones, speakers, IP cameras, tablets, IoT devices, and more..Connectivity protocol:Ethernet,Wi-Fi
AC750 WI-FI SPEED: Provides up to 750Mbps performance using dual-band and patented FastLane(TM) technology.
UNIVERSAL COMPATIBILITY: Works with any wireless router, gateway, or cable modem with Wi-Fi.
WIRED ETHERNET PORT: Simply plug in game consoles, streaming players, or other nearby wired devices using the one 10/100M port for maximum speed.
SAFE & SECURE: Supports WEP and WPA/WPA2 wireless security protocols.
SIMPLE TO SETUP: Press the WPS button to connect to your router. Use the NETGEAR WiFi Analyzer app for optimal location.

Discrete Wall Plug Design

Plug into a wall outlet for a sleek solution that extends your router’s range and stays out of sight.

Intelligently selects between dual bands to minimize interference and maximize speed for your smart wireless devices.

5-Minute Setup

Connect to your existing router with one button press, connect devices to your network, and you’re done.

The dryer will stop working immediately if the temperature is too high because it has a built-in temperature control protection system.Multifunctional Use: This pet ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $199.99 - $99.95
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:50:59 UTC – Details)



Adjustable Speed & Temperature: Strong and stable motor equips this dog blow dryer with several speed and temperature levels. Maximum Wind Speed: 72m/s; Temperature Range: 95℉-135℉. The dryer will stop working immediately if the temperature is too high because it has a built-in temperature control protection system.
Multifunctional Use: This pet blow dryer is equipped with 4 different nozzles to meet different drying needs for different pets. For your various needs, the pet hair dryer can also be used to dry your car, floors, furniture, etc.
Low Noise & Heat Insulation: The unique hose design, thickened metal case and noise reduction structure make the dog dryer 5-15 decibels lower than others when used, so it is suitable for sensitive dogs. The hose holder is thermal insulation for safe use.
Satisfactory Customer Service: If you have any questions or problems about this pet blow dryer, please feel free to contact us. We promise that we will respond immediately.

From the brand

Click on the image to buy！

Power Tools Series

Phalanx 180W rotary tool- Powerful motor brings better performance improvement.

Lithium Battery Series

Long-lasting battery support range, PHALANX universal battery pack for all products requiring lithium batteries.

Lawn&Garden Series

PHALANX gardening tools series, let every gardening enthusiast enjoy the pleasant process of garden design.

PHALANX is a United States brand specializes in electric & pneumatic power tools, garden tools, auto tools and hand tools for home improvements.

We believe excellently designed tools could be your trusted life partner and powerful workmate in your life anywhere and anytime. PHALANX possess a number of series of easy-to-use, on the go lightweight, fashion orientated tools, that with strong power system, and portable Li-lon battery solution.

Special gift for DIYer！Please note: The chuck needs to be tightened with a spanner before use.
【180W & 6-Speed Adjustment】Our rotary tool equipped with a powerful 180w motor, 8000~32000RPM, 6-speed adjustment, refined gear adjustment to make the speed of each speed more stable. From cutting metal to polishing jewelry, it all cover, do what you want!
【Flexible Shaft Like a Pen】Want to have more functions? The flexible shaft is your best helper for both fine work and corner polishing. We make the flexible shaft cause less runout and provide stable output . Play with inspiration, easy to make DIY!
【More Compatibility】This power rotary tool is compatible with all sizes of collets, equipped with 1/8″, 1/16″, 3/32″, 3/25″, more stable when fixing accessories for grinding, cutting, wood carving, sanding, engraving, etc. It is ideal for diversified work.
【Low Noise/Vent/Gear Protect Blocker Design】Comfortable and stable handle, lower noise,Innovation design blockers prevent from unintend touch over speed gear, ventilation holes on the side to discharge heat and increase service life.
【Ideal Choice】DIY or gift, PHALANX is your best choice. we provide a one-year warranty and complete after-sales service, including 180w rotary tool, 139 accessories, 1 storage box , a 16 page manual. Trust and try us.

The idea of PHALANX tools comes from the ease we’d like to provide a simple and enjoyable process for each user. The idea of PHALANX tools comes from our desire to provide an easy and pleasant working process for every user. PHALANX, use inspiration to create possibilities.

PHALANX 180w rotary tool kit has a powerful power system and versatile performance. We equip you with 139 accessories and a 6-speed control system to meet your needs more precisely. Since it is so highly adaptable, a rotary tool can be used in a wide range of DIY projects. Try substituting a rotary tool for other power tools like drills, sanders and electric saws, especially when you need fine motor control for small, tight spaces and projects.

  • This rotary tool kit comes with 139 pieces of accessories that support：engraving/polishing/carving/cutting/drilling/grinding/sanding
  • Tip: When replacing parts, make sure to tighten the collet with a spanner!!! When tightened, the accessories will not come off during use.

  • 6-speed adjustable knob.
  • Innovation design blockers prevent from unintend touch over speed gear

  • The pen-like flex shaft assists you in all kinds of delicate work, allowing your creativity to unfold.
  • Flex shaft of this power rotary tool is about 41.94in.

  • Ventilation holes on the side to discharge heat and increase service life.

Read more

Armed with a rotary tool alone, you can complete the following projects:

  • Carve designs into wood, stone or metal surfaces.
  • Cut and sand wood or plastic.
  • Etch mirrors or glass, including windowpanes, tumblers and glass tables.
  • Cut tile for installing plumbing or for custom backsplashes and flooring.
  • Cut sheet metal into unique shapes to create jewelry, home decor or custom home repairs.
  • Sharpen knives, chainsaws or other blades.
  • Polish jewelry and devices, including laptops and smartphones.
  • Remove rust from devices and metal appliances.

Specifications:

  • Rated Power: 180W
  • Voltage: 120V
  • No Loading Speed: 8000-32000RPM
  • Adjustable Speed: 6 Speeds

Read more

!!!Tip: When replacing parts, make sure to tighten the collet with a spanner!!!

When tightened, the accessories will not come off during use.

Price: $26.99

Product Description

How to play the fast sling puck game?

Each player has five pucks on their side. Now, who’s going to go first to make a move? You can decide this on your own or flip a coin to decide. The winner of the toss will go and make the first move. Players place a puck on the elastic band and try to slingshot the pucks through the hole in the middle to the other side. This exciting, fast-paced game will come to an end when one player cleared all his pucks on the board. Players are allowed to use only one of their hands to grab and push the pucks on the other side.

Perfect Gift

A great game makes a great gift. The sling puck game can be a perfect gift for Easter, Thanksgiving, and Christmas. The neat size of the game is portable and can be taken along with to bar, camping, etc.

Package Specification: 1 x Box 1 x Puck board 10 x Pucks

Sling Puck Game

Sling puck is a fast-paced game where two players compete by firing pucks to the opponents’ side. The first player with no pucks on his side wins. During the exciting game night, the sling puck game helps you unwind after work.

Premium Solid Wood

The chunky pucks made of solid wood are sturdy and well-crafted. With burr-free wood enhances smooth touch while playing. The Coogam sling puck game will soothe your daily stress and make for laughter.

Lighten Your Tension

While it’s a two-player game, it can be even funnier when playing with families and friends watching on the side. They will cheer for their favorite player as if they were watching a real competitive game; scream gladly for the winner.

Premium Solid Wood: High-quality sling puck board games are made of sturdy wood, long-lasting material that is thick and firm for multiple plays. The two puck firing strings are made of strong and durable elastic.
Eye-catching Design: Exquisitely made bright pucks contrast an attractive grass football field presents visual impact to your kids. Sharpen your child’s focus while gaining quicker responses in this fast-paced game. A pretty engaging board game that will keep them play for hours away from electronics.
Family Fun Time: This is a great board game for parents-kids to bond over. The Coogam sling puck board game offers an opportunity to develop social skills and intelligence. Kids get to improve their relationships with parents and friends while having a lot of fun out of it.
Soothe Your Anxiety: Without complicated rules, the sling puck board gameplay simply by ejecting the pucks through to the other side, a perfect game for hand-eye coordination practice as well as relaxation.
Screen-Free Activity: Still struggling to find the balance between digital and real-life connections? Coogam sling puck board game provides a screen-free quality time for kids and family, as a gift for boys and girls, or to have fun at parties.

How to play the fast sling puck game?

Each player has five pucks on their side. Now, who’s going to go first to make a move? You can decide this on your own or flip a coin to decide. The winner of the toss will go and make the first move. Players place a puck on the elastic band and try to slingshot the pucks through the hole in the middle to the other side. This exciting, fast-paced game will come to an end when one player cleared all his pucks on the board. Players are allowed to use only one of their hands to grab and push the pucks on the other side.

Perfect Gift
